posts.title: DIY Ice Cream Maker
posts.content: ThisIsWhyImFat – this ‘Do It Yourself’ style ice cream maker will have you eating professional style ice cream from the convenience of your home. This DIY Ice Cream Maker is a great housewarming gift to give to someone who you secretly want to become obese very rapidly.

posts.title: Vintage Light Bulb
posts.content: Place the ideal finishing touch on any antique lamp you own with the vintage light bulbs. These vintage bulbs bring the past and present together. They showcase an early twentieth century design yet are made using modern energy saving technology.

posts.title: Mind Controlled Helicopter
posts.content: You may not be able to blow shit up with your mind – yet – but you can now at least control a helicopter. The mind controlled helicopter is the high-tech toy that allows you to control it by strapping on a head band and letting your brain do all the heavy lifting.

posts.title: Medical Grade Ear Wax Remover
posts.content: Remove years of built-up wax easily and efficiently using this medical grade ear wax remover. This slightly revolting yet oddly satisfying device inserts into the opening of your ear and showers it with a solution of peroxide and warm water that will drive out the wax.

posts.title: Cherry Blossom Bonsai Seeds
posts.content: Indulge your green thumb as you give your home some aesthetic appeal by planting these cherry blossom bonsai seeds. They’re ideal for your at home zen garden, helping you relax as you meticulously sculpt and prune your miniature tree.

posts.title: Shit Out Of Luck Survival Tool
posts.content: When a virus destroys the human race, you’ll need a survival kit you can trust. The shit out of luck tool has it all — a knife for skinning squirrels, an LED flashlight for distracting pod people, and a fire starter to ward off rabid wolves.

posts.title: Keyboard And Mouse Lap Desk
posts.content: Transform your living room into the comfiest work/game spot in your home using this keyboard and mouse lap desk. It comes with integrated USB ports and features an ergonomic design that’ll let you game and/or work comfortably all day long.

posts.title: Solar System Crystal Ball
posts.content: Feel what it’s like to have our entire cosmic neighborhood in the palm of your hands with this solar system crystal ball. This excellent educational tool gives you a glimpse at Earth and our seven planetary neighbors as they rotate around our local star.

posts.title: Lighter Multi-Tool
posts.content: Turn your favorite lighter into an all purpose pocket knife with the lighter multi-tool. This handy attachment is the ultimate upgrade for any lighter. It goes on in a snap and features a plethora of handy tools including a knife, screwdriver, and bottle opener.

posts.title: Glow In The Dark Pebbles
posts.content: Create a surreal nighttime environment in your yard using these glow in the dark pebbles. These all-weather pebbles emit a brilliant glow that’ll transform your backyard into a magical setting, making them ideal for any landscaping project.

posts.title: Solar Panel Phone Charger
posts.content: Keep your mobile devices juiced up by harnessing energy from our mighty sun by using the solar panel phone charger. This compact charger is lightweight and designed to stand up to dirt, sand, and water damage – making it a must have for the outdoors.

posts.title: Solar Powered Generator
posts.content: Get your electronic devices up and running when you need them the most by using this solar powered generator. No matter where you are, you’ll be able to power your electronic devices and quickly refuel the generator through either a wall outlet or sunlight.
